reviews.review: The title of the movie says it all. This was war and I have still not recovered feom it. The Russos knocked it out of the park. Thanos was amazingly written and directed. The Russos knocked it out of the park. I left the theater feeling akin to getting off of a rollercoaster.
Amazing! Josh brolin was great as Thanos! the ending was amazing! just can say! excited to watch once again !!! #2019_Avengers4 !!
pretty good movie man hope spiderman aint dead and bucky
Go see this movie it's epic
This is the perfect movie. Must watch.

This movie was good but not great. Yes you're invested in the characters so you connect but the writing and the plot are very shoddy. Like every scene with Vision is draining and basically pointless. Dr. Strange is awesome and Iron Man and Spider-Man are awesome. That's about it. Hulk is a cowardly baby!  Even Thor's whole situation makes no sense, but I always like Thor on the screen. Star-Lord is dumb and Groot literally does NOTHING the entire movie. The women kick ass but only Scarlet Witch has any actual powers and she's wimpy throughout the whole thing. This movie could use some Wonder Woman or even Hela gumption for real. Like everybody in the movie was scared and beaten before the fight even started. There was no like " we are going to find a way!" feeling in this movie AT ALL. Still it had some great parts and maybe when Avengers 4 comes out and it can be watched together it will pull this movie together.
Phenomenal. This film was made by comic book fans for comic book fans. It felt like it came right off the pages.

Just wait until the end. It goes from an epic and emotional cinematic story ride to an intense and unexpected ending. You'll sit there lost, full of different emotions. Wow... I am wondering how this will be topped.

Very solid marvel movie maybe top 5 but it fails to bring that jaw dropping excitement and pleasure, in all it leaves you begging for more and maybe that’s where avengers 4 fills in the cracks. Was very hard to juggle so many characters in a small amount of time, some characters really don’t get enough screen time and just feel off?...
